scripts.build: rm -fr build/ web-ext-artifacts/ && elm-make Main.elm --output=build/hoverpad.js && cp encryption.js manifest.json ports.js style.css index.html build/
scripts.fx-web-ext: npm run build && web-ext build -s build && unzip -l web-ext-artifacts/*.zip
scripts.publish-to-gh-pages: mkdir -p dist && cp -r index.html *.js *.css icons dist && gh-pages --dist ./dist
scripts.cordova-emulate-android: npm run build-cordova && cordova emulate android
scripts.cordova-android: npm run build-cordova && cordova run android
scripts.cordova-emulate-ios: npm run build-cordova && cordova emulate ios
scripts.cordova-ios: npm run build-cordova && cordova run ios
